channel.title: [pi]Want to make interface say if you are donator or not
channel.description:
I have a [pi] login interface that I want to make a line of text say if you are donator or not The donator is based off of the character's files' line like donator status=options:0,1,2 and I think its c.isdonator how do I make a line of text say if you are or are no a donator:
public void customInterface() { getPA().showInterface(3023); getPA().sendFrame126("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1 getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners' are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("For help type ::help", 3028);//Line 3 getPA().sendFrame126("For a list of commands please type ::commands", 3029);//Line 4 getPA().sendFrame126("For the rules please type ::rules", 3030);//Line 5 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3031);//Line 6 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3032);//Line 7 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3033);//Line 8 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3034);//Line 9 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3035);//Line 10 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 11 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 12 flushOutStream(); }

item.title: [pi]Want to make interface say if you are donator or not
item.dc:creator: @hgaits hgaits
item.description:
@hgaits wrote:

I have a [pi] login interface that I want to make a line of text say if you are donator or not
The donator is based off of the character’s files’ line like
donator status=options:0,1,2
and I think its c.isdonator
how do I make a line of text say if you are or are no a donator:

public void customInterface() {
getPA().showInterface(3023);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Close Window”, 3024);//Close Text
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners’ are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2
getPA().sendFrame126(“For help type ::help”, 3028);//Line 3
getPA().sendFrame126(“For a list of commands please type ::commands”, 3029);//Line 4
getPA().sendFrame126(“For the rules please type ::rules”, 3030);//Line 5
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3031);//Line 6
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3032);//Line 7
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3033);//Line 8
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3034);//Line 9
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3035);//Line 10
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 11
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 12
flushOutStream();
}

Read full topic
